components.name: Physical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

fields.description:
N-way Joins in Tez produce bad runtime plans whenever they are left-outer joins with map-joins.

This is something which should have a safety setting.
fields.summary: Optimizer: Allow config option to disable n-way JOIN merging
